meanings.definition: A person or thing that guzzles or drinks quickly and greedily.
meanings.sent1: The soda guzzlers at the party finished all the drinks in minutes.
meanings.sent2: The guzzlers at the water fountain were thirsty after playing outside.
meanings.sent3: The guzzlers at the picnic drank so fast, they almost got hiccups!
meanings.sent4: The guzzlers in the race chugged their drinks like they were in a competition.
meanings.sent5: The guzzlers in the movie theater slurped their sodas loudly, annoying others.

meanings.definition: A vehicle or machine that consumes a large amount of fuel.
meanings.sent1: The old truck was known as a guzzler because it used a lot of gas.
meanings.sent2: The guzzlers on the highway were causing traffic due to their fuel consumption.
meanings.sent3: The guzzlers in the garage needed constant refueling to keep running.
meanings.sent4: The guzzlers on the farm worked hard but drank up fuel like thirsty animals.
meanings.sent5: The guzzlers in the city streets emitted dark smoke from their exhaust pipes.
